name: Blastsmith
description:
Blastsmith

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2019 with the "only one" theme.

You are the town's Blastsmith, sparing no time bringing the finest weaponry to your brave adventuring customers. The world is full of monsters to slay and your services are required, so crank up the furnace, melt some ore, and get hammering! How long can you last in the heat of the workshop?

How to Play:

  1. Move with the arrow keys
  2. Interact by moving into the stations
  3. Heat up ore
  4. Mold it into shape
  5. Cool it down
  6. Assemble
  7. Cash in!

Fulfill the customer's order by heating up ore, taking it to the molds and forging it to shape, then cool it down in the water, and finally assemble your desired weapon from the different parts. Failing to fulfill a customer's order will result in losing a heart, after losing all 3 hearts, it's game over.
